tool_description: This API allows you to detect the language of a given text or set of texts. It leverages advanced natural language processing techniques to analyze the provided text and determine the most likely language.
name: Language Detection
title: Language Detection

api_list.name: Health check
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://language-detection19.p.rapidapi.com/health"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "language-detection19.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://language-detection19.p.rapidapi.com/health"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "language-detection19.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
